official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior, in cooperation with the Secretary of Energy, to allocate Pick-Sloan Missouri River Basin Program project pumping power to non-Federal irrigation projects in the State of Montana, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to allocate Pick-Sloan Missouri River Basin Program project pumping power at the firm power rate to the Haidle and Hammond irrigation projects in Prairie and Rosebud Counties, respectively, in Montana. Declares such project as eligible to receive Program electrical power.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior, in cooperation with the Secretary of Energy, to allocate Pick-Sloan Missouri River Basin Program project pumping power to non-Federal irrigation projects in the State of Montana, and for other purposes.
